officialTitle: Reducing Hemarthrosis in Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction With BTB Autograft by the Administration of Intravenous Tranexamic Acid: A Double-Blind Randomized Control Study
inclusionCriteria:
-PATIENTS UNDERGOING AN ACL RECONSTRUCTION WITH BTB AUTOGRAFT
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 60 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Legally incompetent or mentally impaired (e.g., minors, Alzheimer's subjects, dementia, etc.)
* Younger than 18 years of age
* Any patient considered a vulnerable subject
* Have bleeding or clotting disorder
* Preoperative anticoagulation therapy
* Abnormal coagulation profile
* Renal disorder or insufficiency
* Sickle cell disease
